name: Unplanned City Sim [GMTK Game Jam '18]
description:
A City Building Simulator, but you cant choose what you build!!

Instructions:

You Goal is to keep your population Alive, if you reach 0 Population it is Game Over!!

Click on an empty space to build a building, if you have enough resources of course!

it takes Gold and Wood to build a building, and the price exponentially increases the more buildings you build!

BUT BEWARE!! Your buildings will randomly catch fire!!!

Farms: Produces Food

Lumber Yard: Produces Wood

Mine: Produces Gold
